message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with sparse signal recovery from compressive measurements, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The use of $\ell_1$ minimization also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG). The mention of "optimality" in the title suggests a focus on numerical analysis (cs.NA), and the use of "basis pursuit denoising" suggests a connection to mathematical modeling (cs.MM).
